page.title: 04A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I live at Orchard Farm and work from an office at Edale End with 5 wardens and office staff.On Fri.17th May 1985 my son Michael and I got up,break- fasted, cleaned house, fed our 3 dogs. 8.l5 am left home for school and work. At the office dealt with correspon- dence and instructed staff on day's work. 9.3O am met Derbyshire C.C.Foot path Officer to discuss plans for repair Jacob's Ladder footpath. l2.3O to Hayfield to meet people from London requesting use of our farms to make TV commercial. Checked progress of new fence which wardens are erecting to control sheep grazing on Kinderscout. 3.4O pm Collected son from school bus. Returned to office. 5.3O Home. After tea walked round our small flock of sheep to check lambs. ll.OO pm Bed. D.Wilson,Head Warden,National Trust.
